title: Ticket #6474: jar files in java universe don't work with cross platform submit
description: In java universe, the jar files attribute can contain relative paths. Java universe today tries to stat the jar file before passing it to the java runtime, but this can cause problems for relative paths with cross-platforms submits. We should just pass the jar file the user specified to java, and if there's an error with it, let java tell us what the error is.
